subtasks.name: Understanding the Regulation
subtasks.description: Reading and understanding the new regulation requirements for AI and its implications on the business
subtasks.notes: This task is crucial as misunderstanding the regulation can lead to non-compliance

subtasks.name: Identify AI Usage
subtasks.description: Identify if and how the business uses AI, and if these uses fall under the new regulation
subtasks.notes: This task requires a good understanding of the business processes and the technology used

subtasks.name: Develop Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Develop a plan to ensure the business's AI usage is compliant with the new regulation
subtasks.notes: This task may require external legal and technical expertise due to the complexity of the regulation and the technology involved

subtasks.name: Implement Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Implement the measures outlined in the compliance plan
subtasks.notes: This task involves making changes to the business's technology and processes, and may require technical expertise

subtasks.name: Monitor Compliance
subtasks.description: Regularly monitor and review the business's AI usage to ensure ongoing compliance with the regulation
subtasks.notes: This task involves ongoing oversight and may require both legal and technical expertise

key_risks: Risk of misunderstanding the regulation due to lack of legal expertise
Risk of non-compliance due to lack of technical expertise in AI
Risk of non-compliance due to insufficient resources for implementing and monitoring compliance

subtasks.name: Understanding the Regulation
subtasks.description: Reading and understanding the implications and requirements of the regulation
subtasks.notes: This task is the starting point and will dictate the steps to take in the future

subtasks.name: Identifying AI usage
subtasks.description: Identifying if and how the business uses AI models
subtasks.notes: This task is crucial to determine if the regulation applies to the business

subtasks.name: Legal Consultation
subtasks.description: Consulting with a legal expert to understand the compliance requirements
subtasks.notes: This task is mandatory given the low familiarity with regulatory compliance

subtasks.name: Implementing Transparency Requirements
subtasks.description: Implementing processes to ensure transparency in AI model training and usage
subtasks.notes: This task will require technical expertise to understand AI models and implement transparency

subtasks.name: Training Employees
subtasks.description: Training employees on the new processes and their rights and obligations
subtasks.notes: This task is important to ensure all employees understand the new processes and their rights and obligations

key_risks: Lack of legal expertise to understand and implement the regulation
Lack of technical expertise to understand and implement AI transparency requirements
Potential resistance from employees to new processes

subtasks.name: Understanding the Regulation
subtasks.description: Reading and understanding the implications of the RAISE act for the business
subtasks.notes: Without a legal team, the owner will need to spend time understanding the legal language and implications of the regulation.

subtasks.name: Identifying the use of AI
subtasks.description: Identifying if and how the business uses AI frontier models
subtasks.notes: The owner may need to consult with a technical expert to understand if their business uses AI models.

subtasks.name: Implementing Transparency Requirements
subtasks.description: Implementing the necessary transparency requirements for AI frontier model training and use
subtasks.notes: Without a technical team, the owner will need to hire external help to implement these requirements.

subtasks.name: Ensuring Employee Rights and Protections
subtasks.description: Ensuring the protections, rights and obligations of employees are in place as per the regulation
subtasks.notes: The owner will need to understand the HR implications of the regulation and implement necessary changes.

key_risks: Risk of non-compliance due to lack of legal and technical expertise
Risk of fines or penalties due to non-compliance
Risk of not fully understanding the regulation and its implications due to lack of legal expertise

subtasks.name: Understanding the Regulation
subtasks.description: Read and understand the new regulation requirements
subtasks.notes: This task may require more time due to the lack of a legal team and low familiarity with regulatory compliance

subtasks.name: Identify AI usage
subtasks.description: Identify if and how the business uses artificial intelligence models

subtasks.name: Develop Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Develop a plan to ensure compliance with the regulation
subtasks.notes: This task may require more time and external consultation due to the complexity of the regulation and lack of resources

subtasks.name: Implement Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Implement the plan developed in Task 3
subtasks.notes: This task may require more time due to low resources

subtasks.name: Monitor and Update Compliance
subtasks.description: Regularly monitor and update compliance measures as needed
subtasks.notes: This task may require more time due to the need for ongoing compliance and potential changes in the regulation

key_risks: Risk of non-compliance due to lack of legal and technical expertise
Risk of non-compliance due to low resources
Risk of penalties due to non-compliance

subtasks.name: Understanding the regulation
subtasks.description: Read and understand the implications of the new regulation
subtasks.notes: This task is crucial as misunderstanding the regulation could lead to non-compliance

subtasks.name: Identifying applicable business processes
subtasks.description: Identify which business processes involve the use of artificial intelligence models
subtasks.notes: Requires a good understanding of the business processes and the technology involved

subtasks.name: Implementing transparency requirements
subtasks.description: Implement measures to ensure transparency in the training and use of AI models
subtasks.notes: This could involve significant changes to the way AI models are trained and used

subtasks.name: Employee training
subtasks.description: Train employees on the new regulations and their responsibilities
subtasks.notes: This is important to ensure that all employees understand the new regulations and their implications

key_risks: Risk of misunderstanding the regulation and failing to comply
Risk of not properly implementing the transparency requirements
Risk of employees not understanding their responsibilities

subtasks.name: Understand the Regulation
subtasks.description: Read and understand the requirements of the new RAISE Act
subtasks.notes: This task could take longer without a legal background

subtasks.name: Assess AI Usage
subtasks.description: Assess whether the business currently uses or plans to use artificial intelligence models
subtasks.notes: This task requires technical knowledge of the business's operations

subtasks.name: Develop Compliance Procedures
subtasks.description: If applicable, develop procedures for transparency, employee protections, violations, and obligations as per the Act
subtasks.notes: This task could take longer and require outside expertise due to lack of legal team

subtasks.name: Train Employees
subtasks.description: Train relevant employees on new procedures and obligations under the Act
subtasks.notes: This task requires understanding of the new procedures and ability to communicate them effectively

key_risks: Risk of non-compliance due to lack of legal and technical expertise
Risk of penalties if employees are not properly trained and do not adhere to the new procedures

subtasks.name: Understanding the Regulation
subtasks.description: Read and understand the requirements of the RAISE Act
subtasks.notes: This task is crucial as misunderstanding the regulation may lead to non-compliance

subtasks.name: Identifying AI Systems
subtasks.description: Identify any AI systems in use that may be affected by this regulation
subtasks.notes: This task requires technical knowledge to correctly identify AI systems

subtasks.name: Implementing Transparency Requirements
subtasks.description: Implement changes to meet transparency requirements for AI model training and use
subtasks.notes: This task requires technical expertise and may require changes to existing systems

subtasks.name: Ensuring Employee Protections
subtasks.description: Implement changes to ensure protections, rights, and obligations of employees are met
subtasks.notes: This task requires understanding of HR policies and may require changes to existing policies

key_risks: Risk of misunderstanding the regulation due to lack of legal expertise
Risk of non-compliance due to lack of technical expertise to correctly implement changes
Risk of non-compliance due to lack of HR expertise to correctly implement changes to employee protections

subtasks.name: Understanding the regulation
subtasks.description: Read and comprehend the regulation, focusing on how it applies to the business.
subtasks.notes: Without a legal team, this task may be challenging and time consuming.

subtasks.name: Assessing AI usage
subtasks.description: Assess if and how the business uses artificial intelligence frontier models.
subtasks.notes: This task requires a good understanding of the business's technical operations.

subtasks.name: Developing transparency protocols
subtasks.description: Develop protocols for transparency in AI training and use, including appropriate redactions.
subtasks.notes: This task may require hiring external expertise due to its technical and legal complexity.

subtasks.name: Training employees
subtasks.description: Train employees on the new protocols and their rights and obligations under the regulation.
subtasks.notes: This task requires effective communication and training skills.

subtasks.name: Monitoring compliance
subtasks.description: Regularly monitor and ensure compliance with the regulation.
subtasks.notes: This task requires continuous effort and vigilance.

key_risks: Risk of non-compliance due to lack of legal and technical expertise
Risk of non-compliance due to inadequate training of employees

subtasks.name: Understanding the Regulation
subtasks.description: Reading and interpreting the regulation text to understand the requirements
subtasks.notes: As the business owner has low familiarity with regulatory compliance, this task might take longer than usual. It might be beneficial to seek legal advice.

subtasks.name: Identifying AI Usage
subtasks.description: Identifying if and how the business uses artificial intelligence models
subtasks.notes: This task requires a basic understanding of AI technologies.

subtasks.name: Developing Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Developing a plan to meet the transparency and protections requirements of the regulation
subtasks.notes: This task is critical to ensure the business is in compliance with the regulation. It might require hiring a consultant with expertise in AI and legal compliance.

subtasks.name: Implementing Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Implementing the measures outlined in the compliance plan
subtasks.notes: Implementation might require technical changes to the business's AI systems or processes.

subtasks.name: Monitoring and Updating Compliance
subtasks.description: Regularly reviewing and updating the compliance plan and its implementation to ensure ongoing compliance
subtasks.notes: This task is important to ensure that the business remains in compliance as the regulation or business practices change.

key_risks: Risk of non-compliance due to lack of legal and technical expertise
Risk of penalties or sanctions due to non-compliance

subtasks.name: Understanding the regulation
subtasks.description: Review and understand the new law and its implications for the business
subtasks.notes: Without a legal team, the small business owner will need to spend considerable time understanding the new law.

subtasks.name: Assessing AI usage
subtasks.description: Identify and document all instances of AI usage in the business
subtasks.notes: The owner will need to understand the technical aspects of the business to identify AI usage

subtasks.name: Implementing transparency requirements
subtasks.description: Implement and document the transparency requirements outlined in the law for each AI model
subtasks.notes: This task may require hiring or consulting with a technical expert to ensure compliance

subtasks.name: Employee training
subtasks.description: Train employees on the new law and their rights and obligations
subtasks.notes: This task can be performed by the owner or a designated employee

key_risks: Risk of non-compliance due to lack of legal and technical expertise
Risk of penalties due to non-compliance with transparency requirements
Risk of employee dissatisfaction due to lack of training on their rights and obligations
